answers.answer: How much do they shake? Is it like vigorous shaking or just slight wobbling? It could even be an early sign of diabetes

question: hi im only 16 but my hands shake as if i have parkinsons dieses i cant hold a peiace of paper or a spoon od soup with out it shaking, it even throws my typing skills off please help i hope it isnt a early sign of parkinsons
